name: 4 x 4 Slide
description:
Controls + or - to decrease the size to 64 pixels by 64 pixels. Or to increase it back to 256 by 256.

Mouse to drag pieces into place. Only the pieces next to the empty space can move.

When you solve a puzzle you can click on the completed puzzle to return to the menu.

This game is based on the tile moving toys where you randomize the tiles and then move them into place. Each level has a different image, but otherwise the gameplay is the same. There are a total of 8 possible image designs to pick from (two of them are hidden).  (For spoilers of the final images of each level look at the ends.)

This game was inspired by the idea of my last LowRezJam in 2020 where the game structure was a simple 4x4 grid to embrace the idea of a simple game design. 

Music is Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata by Joth.
